summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2013 FORD ESCAPE. WHILE DRIVING AT LOW SPEEDS, THE VEHICLE SPUTTERED AND STALLED. THE CONTACT HAD TO TURN OFF AND RESTART THE VEHICLE MULTIPLE TIMES IN ORDER TO DRIVE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE SAME FAILURE OCCURRED WHILE DRIVING IN REVERSE. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO WALL'S FORD (2 MERRILL ST, SALISBURY, MA 01952) WHERE IT WAS DIAGNOSED THAT THE TRANSMISSION NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 123,000. THE VIN WAS UNAVAILABLE.
